short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Searches periodic table for elements and calculates alpha, beta positive, beta negative, and electron capture decays

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Don't have the time to reference your periodic table while you do your mountain of questions assigned by your Physics teacher? This Google Chrome extension allows you to quickly search for elements and calculates alpha, beta+/- & electron capture decays.

GitHub repo: https://github.com/twotoque/physicscalculator/
